CustomField.description: It is possible to set up a Test Mode Subscription that forwards messages after it has completed its work. In order to set up the messages that the Subscription forwards, we need to link a Test Mode Publication to it. The relationship exists on the Test Mode Publication so that multiple Publications can be linked to a single Test Mode Subscription.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: It is possible to set up a Test Mode Subscription that forwards messages after it has completed its work. In order to set up the messages that the Subscription forwards, we need to link a Test Mode Publication to it.
CustomField.label: Test Mode Subscription
